column1: The Pit Room////Can't come to Texas without eating BBQ. The Pit Room was a good intro but I wasn't blown away. The boo and I shared the Three Meat Dinner with Brisket
column3: and Venison Sausage with Mac n Cheese and Brussel Sprouts. Looking at the photos other people took vs. what we got
column4: it seems like we got way less meat
column5: but I could be crazy. The brisket was juicy
column9: were disappointingly dry and flavorless. We enjoyed the spicy sausage
column10: but the Brisket was by far the best protein. The sides were good too
column11: and I could've eaten more Brussel Sprouts. Good smoky BBQ
column12: but I prefer my BBQ with lots of sauce.
